overview: A couple's perfect marriage goes dangerously awry when the jealous husband struggles with the news of the wife expecting a baby. As the news of his wife secret love affair came as devastating blow, Simon feels compelled to retaliate destroying the only person he genuinely loved. Simon orchestrates a vengeful plan against Ana to make her pay for what se did.  Director Alexandra Balda Writer Alexandra Balda(screenplay by) Stars Demi CastroRachel ComeauDeisi Del Toro
title: Vengeful Love
